name: Create ActiveCampaign contacts from Zoom webinars and store them on Airtable
description: Whenever a new webinar begins, this scenario is instantly triggered, the approved registrants are retrieved and contacts are created/updated in ActiveCampaign. The contacts are also added to Airtable for record keeping and analysis purposes. You will need to use this [Airtable template.](https://airtable.com/shrkgxqdY3JpwH4wM/tblXLLJFlzg5fSOtG/viww9HVDZKO6boipQ?blocks=hide)
